channel.title: _Index on Allen Ma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in _Index on Allen Ma's Blog

item.title: New Year - New Website
item.description: Still using Hugo to generate my sites and the same-old hand-rolled CSS. Hopefully, I’ll be posting more about my excursions in machine-learning over January. This site also supports LaTeX via MathJax $${\sqrt {n}}\left(\left({\frac {1}{n}}\sum _{i=1}^{n}X_{i}\right)-\mu \right)\ {\xrightarrow {d}}\ N\left(0,\sigma ^{2}\right)$$ Syntax higlighting via highlight.js - neat, woohoo, yay! /s def hello_world(): print("this is neat")

item.title: About
item.description: I am a sophomore studying Computer Science and Math at Colby College. I am from New Zealand, and though I’ve been told many times that my country is the most beautiful place on Earth, I think every place has its own unique charm. Living and studying in Maine, I’ve explored a few very interesting landscapes, and look forward to exploring many more. I enjoy programming, woodworking, grasping new ideas (whatever field they may be in) and solving math problems - especially when they are not too tricky and have an elegant solution.
